name: Traxxion
overview: A horizontally scrolling shooter also published in Videogiochi Settimanale #01. Get the hell out of there" screamed his monitor. With a blinding CRAAASH the comet had struck TRAXXION. The system had gone berserk. Glowing like a dwarf star, the space platform is breaking up. Robocars speed in panic, beyond control of the system. With the screams of a tortured beast Traxxion begins to burn like a furnace. Time, the very gold dust of your life, is running out. You tear along the track and destroy everything in your path - everything in your sight.
